description.ko: 고대 화산 열수구 주변에서 생체 발광 생명체들이 천연 네온 조명을 만들어내는 고요하고 칠흑 같은 바다 깊은 곳으로의 탐험입니다.
description.en: A deep-dive into the silent, pitch-black depths of the ocean where bioluminescent life forms create a natural neon light show around ancient volcanic vents.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of the deep ocean floor, bioluminescent jellyfish and mysterious aquatic creatures glowing in the midnight zone, hydrothermal vents emitting ethereal smoke, neon blue and violet lighting, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, serene and mysterious atmosphere.
